lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I am interested in development and from my travels I have really seen that it is often individuals who can and want to make differences - they just need the opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help people engaged in cultural exchanges. Even though people have the money and opportunity to learn and travel, they often don't. I want people at all levels to be more connected and understanding.

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: How could I not? This is a remarkable opportunity to have a positive impact. Thank you Kiva!

lender.name: Larry & Heather
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate and have much. We want to share with the world. Peace.

lender.name: Mrs. Greenfield's Class
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference. We are interested in learning about Microloans and how they can effect change.

lender.name: MariÃ«lle & Roel
lender.loan_because: We can!

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Design and manage civil construction projects such as bridges, buildings, and highways.

lender.name: Joni Naluz
lender.loan_because: Want to make a difference - a little step at a time.

lender.name: MZRwll
lender.loan_because: I want my donations to be active and helpful directly to an individual. I find great pleasure in this more personal touch
lender.occupational_info: Minimal but much for me

lender.name: Marita
lender.loan_because: I am excited to watch others succeed and to play a small role in their success.
lender.occupational_info: I help insurance agents around the US choose which company and which insurance policy is best for their client.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: I think, that it is important to work together over all nations, countries and religions. Nature needs our network and better understanding

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: "Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him." -Booker T. Washington

lender.name: Arnaud
lender.loan_because: Ideas and energy need money to become actual projects. They have it, and I have a bit of money I can give them a hand with.
lender.occupational_info: Promote and develop a website.

lender.name: Spirit of Change
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: We educate readers about body, mind, spirit and global health.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: it allows those in less fortunate situations to unleash the power of their own ingenuity

lender.name: danny
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I sell dancewear and dance shoes

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: So many people have helped me along the way and I feel even the smallest amount can help someone -- hopefully it reflects my gratitude for all who have had faith in me during my journey.

lender.name: rebecca
lender.loan_because: It is a way to make a change in the world that is extremely easy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom. I take care of my kids.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I help US college students find financial assistance for their studies.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to help the less fotunate
lender.occupational_info: studying for exams in the UK

lender.name: David & Kelly
lender.loan_because: Because this is a hand up, not a hand out and it feels like the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in the wine industry

lender.name: Ms. Hart
lender.loan_because: We want to help others lead worthwhile lives. That is the theme of our 7th grade school year and we want to see it in action.
lender.occupational_info: We are students who love to help others.

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: It's very interesting to see the many ways people work to support themselves and their families. It makes me feel great to help in such an efficient way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired. I have six grandchildren. I like to be with them and I enjoy playing the recorder.

lender.name: ABC Confortini Hardy
lender.occupation: Student, Software Engineer and Graduate Student
lender.loan_because: We are in solidarity with people around the world.

lender.name: Brendan and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I've lived in developing countries and seen the merits of microfinance.

lender.name: Eric N.
lender.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Peru and I understand what this relatively little amount means to us and what a great impact it can create.

lender.name: Spritle
lender.loan_because: I have had the great fortune to travel to other countries to meet wonderful people. I am please that Kiva gives me an opportunity to make a personal difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate a computer software project with people in the United States, Switzerland, Italy, and India.

lender.name: David
lender.occupational_info: I help other people to get work done, by keeping track of priorities and communicating with customers.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to live in a country where even students are rich.
lender.occupational_info: I study Earth Sciences in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.

lender.name: Daina
lender.occupation: Bar Owner and Roller Derby Girl

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Giving back is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Soumen
lender.loan_because: I have been lucky and blessed with so much (family, health, and career) and wish to enable others to make their own luck.

lender.name: Student Micro Lenders
lender.loan_because:
As Confucious said, "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime."
We are high school students and this is our way of doing community service. Benefits from this effort are: * We get to help people in a lasting way. * We get to learn about cultures and living conditions around the world. * Learn communication and leadership skills. * Learn responsibility and value of money.
lender.occupational_info:
Student Micro Lenders Team:
Ajay Sohmshetty Archana Sohmshetty
Sponsors of our loans include:
http://www.amazon.com/Skipping-Grade-Insights-Archana-Sohmshetty/dp/1466222905 - $25 http://www.MyndBook.com/ - $25 http://www.401ktimer.com/ - $15 http://www.aim4a.com/ - $15 http://www.ScribblePlace.com/ - $10
Ajay Sohmshetty - $10 Archana Sohmshetty - $10 Cans recycling drives - $15 Murali Seetha - $5 Vijay V - $10 Suresh - $10 Sree - $10 Poornima - $10 Anisha Konkipudi - $2 Amar and Sujata Kambhatla - $50 Saaketh Sirani - $2 Vineet Duggi - $15 Asha Duggi - $15 Madhu Duggi - $15
Thank you all very much for your kind support!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I want other people to have the opportunities I have been offered in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who are hurt.

lender.name: Young
lender.loan_because: I am a Christian who wish to share in God's blessings and to do my small part to show that there are Americans who care about the well-being of people around the world. May God bless those who help themselves and others!
lender.occupational_info: I run tests to make sure that web sites like this work correctly and in the best way that it can.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: To hopefully make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Engineer,entrepreneur, and business owner.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I understand the impact that we can make throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney with my own practice working in cross border transactions.

lender.name: Gradesix
lender.loan_because: we at Alfred-Almond Central School are learning about and sharing ways to practice caring and compassion.
lender.occupational_info: We are sixth graders who have collected 2480 drink cans with .05 deposits in order to fund four different entrepreneurs and the KIVA organization.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I fly planes.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: I know that if we all work together and see the world as one community, we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Management of people and resources in a technology driven environment

lender.name: Ali & Hill
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel very blessed in our lives and want others to achieve their dreams so they can feel the same.

lender.name: B.J.
lender.occupation: Now enjoying retirement and volunteer work.
lender.loan_because: I am willing to help people who want to work and accept responsibility. .

lender.name: Benedict
lender.loan_because:
the money can be used multiple times by multiple parties, contributing to repeated betterment for parties.
Meaning, more people are helped with the same amount of money, and that makes sense. Everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info: My partners and I help people solve household problems, including financial difficulties. We educate and provide business support to beginning entrepreneurs, like you.

lender.name: Charles and Penny
lender.loan_because:
1. Action is louder than words
2. Make the world a better place
3. I believe in Kiva's approach of using microfinance
4. Kiva rocks
5. Love your neighbor
6. Pay it forward
7. I want to help women who are especially less privileged in many countries. Women face many more hurdles than men.
8. Being a role model to my child

lender.name: Willem
lender.loan_because: I think that more people should have a chance to start their own bussiness.
lender.occupational_info: I am busy with the promotion of the use and acceptance of Complementary Alternative Medicine (CAM) in the Netherlands

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: i'd like to try & help people as i can, I know the world won't with a simple gesture from me, but we have to start somewhere

lender.name: brking
lender.loan_because: I believe people should leave the world a better place than they came into it.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: Follow the money - make it personal

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I want to make this world a better place. I think it is important to be thankful and help others who are less fortunate, and this is a great opportunity to do that

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance... and a helping hand.

lender.name: Debcar
lender.whereabouts: Wandering the US in an RV
lender.loan_because: it's fun

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: Jesus isn't just a concept, or even "religiousness" He is Real and Practical and Loves all people. He stands for change, love, action, and help...so let us participate in making social change, and lending help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a university. . .I want to give what I can, and I want to help whomever -as I am able, no matter who they are, where they are, or what they believe...It's time to make changes in the world...even as just a student, we can do great things for one another. I have not achieved anything alone. I have been helped by many people to achieve my goals, and to be able to study, which is a great blessing! I wish to Thank Jesus for my blessings by helping others achieve their dreams and goals, even if it is just a little piece at a time.

lender.name: Ben and Joe
lender.loan_because: We really have no clue how difficult life is for people seeking Kiva loans and it makes us feel better about ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: We help large companies market their services and products.

lender.name: Estuary Bath & Body
lender.loan_because: This money is loaned in memory of Pedro Jimenez, an innovator in the world of micro finance.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I own Estuary Bath & Body. We makes soaps and skin care products in a socially and environmentally responsible way and give 10% or our profits to help people live better and healthier lives.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I can - I think doing good in the world will benefit everyone involved
lender.occupational_info: I own a Retail Bakery in the Wellington Area of New Zealand selling a broad range of Bakery Products

lender.name: Ashlie
lender.loan_because: I want to help in any way I can. Small or big..it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I want to be able to give back.

lender.name: Meryl
lender.loan_because: I can finaly do something
lender.occupational_info: I am advertising on the Internet for companies

lender.name: Mary Gail
lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful oportunity to make an impact on others and give back to the world
lender.occupational_info: I help people work through their personal problems

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who want to help themselves

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: My money will make a difference for a fellow friend, and their new life will make a difference for me.
lender.occupational_info: I write

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I feel that my life has been very blessed, and I think this is an awesome and intriguing way to give something back to the world and to help those who are doing their best to make an honest living.
lender.occupational_info: I work full time in my father's business (printing and mailing financial statements) as well as attending school to earn a master's degree in Computers and Business.

lender.name: Rosannah
lender.loan_because: I want the world to not have many people needing money. It would be a lot better if everyone had enough money for food, shelter, and water.
lender.occupational_info: im 14 yrs old and a freshman in high school. i dance and ice-skate during the week. i also have a chiwussel named Rufus!

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: We must help each other achieve what is possible. Waiting for others to do it is not an option anymore, we must step up and act.
lender.occupational_info: I promote the use of geospatial technologies.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to get started, get bigger or just get what you need! Many people out there have the will...they just need the way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Science and Biology teacher at a private Girls' school located in Medellin, Colombia. I also donate my time, energy and money working with underprivileged kids in pueblos surrounding Medellin.

lender.name: catjuliettevolkermiles
lender.loan_because: we all belong to each other.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: I know that we all can help each other in big ways. We don't live in many countries, but one world, together. What affects one, has an effect on all.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people that they do have the power to heal themselves and create their lives to be what they want them to be. It's fun!

lender.name: Molly
lender.occupational_info: I seek to find, support, and develop innovative and entrepreneurial solutions to global poverty

lender.name: TELUS Geeks with Cash
lender.loan_because: We believe that helping ambitious entrepreneurs build their businesses is a great way to improve their lifestyle and is a fundamental step to building a sustainable local economy.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of lenders who all work for TELUS, a Canadian telecommunications company. Some of us are, or have been, entrepreneurs ourselves and can really appreciate what it takes to start and grow a business. We wish you all the best and look forward to watching your enterprises grow.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: People everywhere deserve options to improve their lives and have more power to direct the course of their future. Microfinance is one tool for making this happen. ! Viva Kiva !
lender.occupational_info: Usually I develop affordable housing in urban areas, but now I'm a Kiva fellow in Mexico!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: My son introduced me to Kiva a few years ago and we want to support this global effort to help those not as fortunate as us. Our goal is to make life on this planet safer, healthier and happier for all children.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes products used on commercial construction projects.

lender.name: Kiandra
lender.loan_because: i know there are good people doing good things...i believe in you!
lender.occupational_info: i am a stay at home mom of two ages 5 and 3.5...i am also an artist, i work with fabrics, old clothes making quilts, art and fiber art. i also love to bake and cook.

lender.name: Alexis
lender.loan_because: There is a deep sense of pride in being able to provide for yourself and your family. Everyone deserves that.

lender.occupational_info: Build people same like Kiva did, but different way. Thats why i love kiva since the 1st time I heard it from Oprah.

lender.occupational_info: i help people recover from losses involving their homes, autos, sickeness, injury and death

lender.occupational_info: I teach young children math, science, reading and social science. Most of all though, I hope I teach them by example, how to be a caring person and a contributor of good in the world.

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Anne

lender.name: Kari Anne

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: If a negligible part of my income can help out a few people so that they are enabled to provide a nicer life for themselves and their kids, it's pretty awesome. Might help improve the image of the U.S. after what our government's policies have done worldwide.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a jack-of-all-trades doing construction, plumbing, electrical, etc.

lender.name: Peter & Laura
lender.loan_because:
To change the world you have to start with one starfish:
The Starfish Story Original Story by: Loren Eisley
One day a man was walking along the beach when he noticed a boy picking something up and gently throwing it into the ocean. Approaching the boy, he asked, âWhat are you doing?â The youth replied, âThrowing starfish back into the ocean. The surf is up and the tide is going out. If I donât throw them back, theyâll die.â âSon,â the man said, âdonât you realize there are miles and miles of beach and hundreds of starfish? You canât make a difference!â
After listening politely, the boy bent down, picked up another starfish, and threw it back into the surf. Then, smiling at the man, he said, âI made a difference for that one.â

lender.name: Rene
lender.loan_because: I am extremely grateful for what I have in lthis life and I feel it is my duty to help those who need our help.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze data to produce business findings which will aid in making better business decisions.

lender.name: Imran
lender.loan_because: My parrot tells me to... :P
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer scientist working in the field of designing and analyzing computer algorithms.

lender.occupational_info: I like math and history, but a lot depends on the teacher. I'm interested in drama in a big way, too.

lender.name: Mauve Dove Inc.

lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur. Started building my business over 20 years ago.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can't afford not to.

lender.name: Penelope
lender.occupational_info: I raise money for non-profits.

I co-founded Gyllene Skor, a digital agency located in Helsinki Finland and at the same time, I founded ArcticStartup.com - Northern Europe's most extensive media site covering Nordic and Baltic startups.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: "I shall pass this way but once. Therefore, any good that I can do or any kindness that I can show, let me do it now, for I shall not pass this way again."

lender.name: Darcy

lender.name: mac

lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to change the world, one business at a time.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: my brother inspires me.

lender.loan_because: I'm entrepeneur and I love to support people. I believe that when people grow in a community, they will inspire also other people to set new goals.

lender.occupational_info: I educate high school seniors. I teach College Algebra at the high school level as well at a community college.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their dreams and provide for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students in college to help them academically. I also coach a soccer team made up of 10 year old girls.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: It's a brilliant idea !
lender.occupational_info: Product development for an italian design firm

lender.name: patrick
lender.loan_because: i have had the dream of financial empowerment since i finished college and i am glad God has helped me this far.
lender.occupational_info:
Goodday,
i am a private money lender with banking partnerships that will guaranty loans of any amount.i work in the UK and i give out both local and international loans based on a 5% interest rate.my informations are included below. send me your identification details and details on how you want the loan to be released to you.
send your informations to me today:
Name: Addresss: Phone number: Date of Birth: Occupation: Amount of Loan: Loan Duration Limit:
Your transfer will be done within a couple of days as soon as all proceedings have been met.
feel free to communicate with me.you can give me a call at anytime.
6750 Strand Street, WC2R 1HB London, United Kingdom. Phone:+447045762939 +447031843720 Fax: +44 8716618409 email: mr.patrick.smith@gamil.com mr.patrick.smith.2008@gmail.com
Best Regards Mr.Patrick Smith

lender.name: Mira
lender.loan_because: I can....and it feels so GOOD!

lender.name: Charlotte
lender.loan_because: It's an interesting way of charity because you feel more involved and every time you get a refund you feel happy for the lender.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a RN and work as a operationskoordinator at the Orthopeadic Departement.

lender.name: Turner/Houston Family
lender.loan_because: Our family loves to loan to entrepreneurs who benefit by growing their businesses and bettering their lives with their efforts. Our 11-year old son has learned more about supporting others through KIVA than any other charitable cause.
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of 3, one who sells software to schools and government agencies, the other who is a part-time worker at a school and Mom and our 11 year old son who loves sports and works really hard in school.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I lend money to small and medium sized businesses in Canada.

lender.name: SteBalboFaberGioRoby
lender.loan_because: We are 5 enevironmental engineers, former university mates, and we loan because we think that credit should be considered as one of the fundamental rights of the people, and that it may help individuals to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: We have the same background but different careers: Stefano currently works in the renewable energy sector, Balbo and Roby work in an engineering company, Faber works in the waste sector, Gio works in the security and environmental compliance sector

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe it is the best way to help others. It provides the goal of repayment, and the liquidity needed to help these talented people harness the powerful forces of the marketplace.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain communications for phones and computers.

lender.name: gabriel
lender.loan_because: i loan because i make benefit and public relation to the world...
lender.occupational_info: well am a dancer by profession and am ready to loan as much as possible so dat people who are in need of loan can be happy!!!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that we should all help each other to be successful.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: It's necessary.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I am just sole proprietorship and i would be very happy if your organization can help me to rise my business in high level to sustain my family lives.
lender.occupational_info: My business is located at Elmina Central Region Ghana,probably Africa, I am located at fishing community and i decide to deal with fishing materials here in my village. I am finding opportunity to expand the business and i think you are going to help me for this. Thank you and hope to hear from you soon........

lender.name: carole
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: it means a lot to me to be able to provide the means to help those who want to better their own lives through hard work and determination.
lender.occupational_info: Analytical mapping

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It is a way for me to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Boilermaker [Welder]

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: of the love God has for me and everyone. I want to help empower people to reach their potential.
lender.occupational_info: Some of my hobbies are reading, soccer, and swimming. I'm also learning to speak Spanish. I love spending time with friends and family. I'm starting college next fall. After I graduate, I want to work around the world, helping those in poverty.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: like the idea of helping people become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I'm at the end of the flow with medical accounts.I'm the person that figures what went wrong with the process and get it resolved..

lender.name: Jake Fields
lender.loan_because: I want to help other entrepreneurs that are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Jake Fields: Internet Entrepreneur

lender.name: Arhammar
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. How awesome is it to help someone help themselves. It's a win/win for all concerned.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: it's simple and it works.

lender.name: Giovanna
lender.loan_because: I was raised to believe in the goodness of people. I was taught to always give to others and never to expect anything in return. I just wish to help others so they can help themselves and their families. I truly believe they can achieve their dreams if we all give together.
lender.occupational_info: I provide mental health services to mostly low income individuals and families.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I believe in hope and the future

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the lives of people.
lender.occupational_info: I help students in school to make good choices.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I sell seeds for peppers and tomatoes to customers all over the world.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: Because anyone who is passionate enough to start there own business needs a helping hand . Congragulations to everyone for challenging themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student, english major and preforming arts minor.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: It's wonderful to help people who need just a little help and who are so resourceful and grateful
lender.occupational_info: My work is being a grandmother, mother, and friend with God as my guide and the center of my life.

lender.name: L. D.
lender.loan_because: What is small to some is big to others.

lender.name: Ans & Frank Bos
lender.occupation: We are both employed in finance.
lender.loan_because: People in developing countries don't need our charity, they need our help. Micro-finance is a way to partner with them and help them help themselves.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I want to help pull developing countries out of the hole we created for them through imperialism and systematic exploitation, and I want to make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I get up, eat, take a shower, and go to school. Pretty boring, really.

lender.name: Eric
lender.occupation: college student at the University of Florida
lender.loan_because: Because everyone needs a helping hand every now and then
lender.occupational_info: Going to school so that I can follow my dreams

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: Loving God by serving people Mathew 25:35 For I was hungry and you gave me something to eat, I was thirsty and you gave me something to drink......

lender.name: Happy Hollow School
lender.loan_because: The children of the Happy Hollow School Preschool and Kindergarten classes are excited about learning about the world we all share. By making loans to real people, working hard and making a difference in these far off places, the students of Happy Hollow School feel like they are part of this distant community and that this small loan can bring us all closer together. In turn, the students learn how ingenuity, hard work and a helpful friend and community can make a big difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: The students at Happy Hollow School work hard and have fun learning about new ideas, new culture and even more about everything that they can do. Most of all the students learn that they can do anything they set out to do - as the people that the Happy Hollow School makes loans to prove every day.

lender.name: Scott and Jessica
lender.loan_because: God is good, and his love directs our path.
lender.occupational_info: Scott makes computer programs that work on the Internet. Jessica takes care of our 2 year old sonn and has a photography business, she is awesome at it.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It makes so much sense and I get to know a little about the loan recipients and lenders.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the upkeep of the space in a large San Francisco law firm with 300 employees and oversee some support services including mail, copy, fax, supply purchasing, reception, catering. I am also studying holistic nutrition at Bauman College.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: something so small to me can make such a big difference to someone else.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: These people work hard (usually much harder than people in the West, and in much worse conditions) and deserve some help to improve the quality of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Social Entrepreneurship

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Terri
lender.loan_because: I believe in the micro loan system
lender.occupational_info: I work in post secondary distance education

lender.name: Bank of Geoff
lender.loan_because: It's a cool way to make a difference--helping others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I program for various sites for the Web.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: i just wanna help people.
lender.occupational_info: i sell fedex services. i help people ship things around the world.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I thought it was about time to put my money where my mouth was......
lender.occupational_info: I teach university level history courses.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: Investing in an individual with a small business helps them financially, but also helps build independence and self respect.
lender.occupational_info: I teach bankers how to prepare a quarterly report that bank regulators use to monitor the financial condition of each bank. I present 1-2 day and internet seminars for banking associations throughout the United States.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: I think well placed money can make huge changes in people's lives, and those who have it possess a greater responsibility to help those who don't.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Helping others is gift you give yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I practice medicine using natural remedies such as herbs, vitamins, and homeopathics. I love what I do.

lender.name: Bruce and Mike
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: retired

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: sometimes all people need is a chance and it can propel them to new heights.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses to better connect with their customers through Internet video applications.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: "People don't understand that not only can they make a difference; it's their responsibility to do so." - Florence Robinson

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I want to help in a micro way.
lender.occupational_info: Researcher/writer for a U.S. corporation and mom of three kids.

lender.name: ayep
lender.loan_because: need to buy dragon fruit seeds
lender.occupational_info: hi,...... i am a dragon fruit farmer, i mean i have a small agriculture. dragon fruit is a special fruit. very special because in my country the fruit just needed in chinesse new year. i need the money to get a new variety of dragon fruit seeds.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: someone believed in my business dream and gave me the opportunity to start my own company...this is my chance to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies elevate their brands

lender.name: Al
lender.loan_because: I think living in a country full of weath I need to help and support the entrepreneurs of the future.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: It's leaving a good mark.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand their pets. And I help pets live peacefully with their human family.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to be born in a wealthy country. I feel it's my responsibility to help out.
lender.occupational_info: Lobbying state government to support legislation beneficial to insurance agents.

lender.name: Joe
lender.occupational_info: I work with group that builds hydraulic systems that are used all over the world

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't you?

lender.name: Cherissa
lender.occupation: Small Business Owner : Ice Cream Shop
lender.loan_because: helping someone for opportunity to succeed, is a priceless thing to invest in.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to lend a helping hand. We should all strive to make connections with as many peoples and places in the world as we can. I believe this is the path to peace.

lender.name: Bjorn
lender.loan_because: Helping other people around the world brings rewards to everyone involved.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the international shipping business.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Our family believes that providing these loans allows everyone an opportunity to improve the world. We really feel fortunate to be able to provide these loans for people and families that truly deserve it.

lender.name: Ron and Marlene
lender.loan_because: "Called from worship into service Forth in your great name we go, To the child, the youth, the aged, Love in living deeds to show. Hope and health, goodwill and comfort, Counsel, aid, and peace we give, That your children, Lord, in freedom, May your mercy know, and live". Hymn text by Albert Bayly, The Liturgy of the Hours
lender.occupational_info: Retired manufacturing engineer responsible for electrical feedthroughs in implantable heart pacemakers; retired Early Childhood Special Education teacher

lender.name: Rae
lender.loan_because: I used to be a single parent struggling to make ends meet. Now I'm in a position where I can afford to help others. This is one small way I can pay back the people who helped me when I needed it.

lender.name: Qin
lender.loan_because: everyone that can should
lender.occupational_info: housewife

lender.name: Gale
lender.loan_because: In March of 2007 I visited India on business. I came home with a new awareness of how fortunate I am. Microfinancing is a wonderful way to help people build better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and manage teams of people who build systems people use to save money for their retirement

lender.name: natalie
lender.loan_because: We all need help once in awhile.

lender.name: The Barzin Family
lender.loan_because: It's incredibly painless for modern Western people and it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help prepare new information for doctors and put it on the internet.

lender.name: Cristy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe that I am lucky and blessed to live in such a wonderful place and have so many opportunities. I believe that it is important to give to others...to give freely without hesitation or expectation!
lender.occupational_info: Massage Therapist

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: I know it works. I lived in Botswana for 2 years and I witnessed what enterprising women could do with just a little bit of money.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to help people find the information they need to get their jobs done quickly and easily.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I support microfinance

lender.name: Raquela
lender.loan_because: because i want to make a diffrence in this wourld by helping people who don't have the ability to help themselves

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I want help others reach their dreams, as I work towards mine.
lender.occupational_info: I am a highschool student. I work at a local Japanese Bistro.

lender.name: Asmo Halinen
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org is a great way to help!
lender.occupational_info: Internet Business Director in a Finnish media company, startup activist.

lender.name: Marcus
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to be helped by people in my life and I want to give something back.

lender.name: CHUN-CHIEH
lender.loan_because: I hope there is a wonderful world.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I hope that people will come to understand each other better, and that I will learn more about the world. Also, I intend to put the Ki into Kiva. You may reach me at jimmysv@gmail.com
lender.occupational_info: Government employee working with the production of drinking water.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think it's worth doing. You never know when the littlest thing you do is going to have a major impact on someone. I recently started sponsoring a child through children-inc, but wanted to do more and this looked like a great opportunity to assist others and create a chain reaction of events that will benefit many in the process.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently buying a small business that deals in "new age" services and items. Additionally I act as a ghost writer and motivational speaker.

lender.name: RenÃ©
lender.loan_because: For me Kiva.org is an opportunity to help the less fortunate people. And a loan is the (I think) best way to do so. Kiva.org makes it easy and very approachable and in the end it doesn't cost you a cent.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I care about your lives and I would love to see you increase and expand in life.
lender.occupational_info: Fulfilling

lender.name: Hamish
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and I am grateful for that.

lender.name: Remarkable Innovation
lender.occupational_info: Remarkable Innovation provides research and technical advisory services to those developing, or investing in, innovative technologies.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Kiva is one of the best ways ever created to help people succeed.

lender.name: Karina
lender.loan_because: This is such an easy and direct way to give back to the countries I'm fortunate enough to visit.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for an environmental software company.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Money has to be accessible to people with a project.

lender.name: Adam & Christine
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are lucky enough to be able to loan.

lender.name: T L
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in whatever way I can.

lender.name: Kyla
lender.loan_because: I collect money instead of birthday gifts and then loan it to other people through Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in grade four. I love school!

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the opportunity to succeed through hard work.

lender.name: Soren
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving everyone an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: In a spirit free from economical calculations and political power games, find the inspiration, the vision and the strength to meet life in a creative sustaining way

lender.name: Tonia
lender.loan_because: I believe that the best way to alleviate poverty is to help people help themselves. There are a lot of hard-working, talented people around the world who simply haven't had the opportunities that I've had. This is how I hope to return some of the abundance that I enjoy.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a regional government in the Netherlands. I advise on economic matters, ranging from (corporate) finance for start ups to how to improve the education level of our work force.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Try to help people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Coordinate the activities of workers on a common project.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Kiva's a hand-UP, not a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an internet site. We capture the 'clicks' that people make on our site. I tabulate the clicks so that we can tell our advertisers what is most interesting to our visitors. That's how we can ensure the site is free to visitors and that we are always expanding the areas that are most interesting to the visitors.

lender.name: Famille Santerre-CrÃªte
lender.loan_because: Every bit helps

lender.name: Merilyn
lender.loan_because: Someone once helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I have an old church which I have restored as a special events venue. I primarily serve as a location for weddings and receptions in southwest Louisiana

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to give hope to people in developing countries and help them and their families to have a better, more fulfilling quality of life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help other people! I wish I had more to give!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a middle school (6-8 grade) helping students with special needs.

lender.name: Brad
lender.occupational_info: Help managers improve their business operations

lender.name: Ayovi
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and I want to make a positive change in the world. No matter how small it may seem, it truly makes a big difference in the lives we help. It's my way of Loving my Brothers & Sisters all over the Globe.
lender.occupational_info:
I founded Virtuous Vision Enterprises making a positive impact through Networking, Volunteering and Lending.
We have been able to help inner city teens to travel internationally through our teen missions program.

lender.name: tina Hill
lender.loan_because: It often takes only a little kindness to change someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer operator and write murder mysteries

lender.name: Maria/Elisabet
lender.loan_because: we want to make a change

lender.name: Michael & Sara
lender.loan_because: we believe in making the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: Michael works at a coffee shop making drinks and selling coffee. Sara works at a factory making baby wipes.

lender.name: Bryna
lender.loan_because: It is an effective and simple way to make a big difference in other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work with activists to help individuals who are unjustly imprisoned or who are at risk of human rights abuses.

lender.name: Elwin
lender.loan_because: I can help
lender.occupational_info: I sell components for trucks and trailers.

lender.name: worldly babes
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to help women all over the world to be successful
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of women that teach, run a business, manage money and supervise therapists at an occupational therapy clinic

lender.name: Vinson Family
lender.loan_because: Our family believes in the concept of paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: WSBR provides a long-term home to boys who are in need of a stable environment.

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: seemed like a nice thing to do
lender.occupational_info: Urban public high school - Chicago

lender.name: Ashwin
lender.loan_because: Its good for them and even better for me.

lender.name: Leeann
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the individual stories behind the load requests, and by the belief that I am making both a sound investment and a real difference to someone I've never met.

lender.name: Grethe
lender.loan_because: I want to help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of running a home for children and youth.

lender.name: Burt and Lois
lender.loan_because: We like to help others...and learn about people and places in other parts of the world.

lender.name: Nathanael
lender.loan_because: I believe in making a difference.

lender.name: Hilde Bygdevoll
lender.occupation: Regulatory Affairs Manager, A/S Norske Shell
lender.loan_because: I joined KIVA after reading about it in Bill Clinton's new book "Giving". I love the concept of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I love traveling and meeting new people, see new things and learn about the world.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I have visited Africa, Zambia, and have been in the compounds. I know how hard it is for people to run a small business and feed their family. Many people are looking after grandchildren or working without a partner due to AID/HIV. I admire those who are trying to make a go of their businesses and are not simply looking for Santa Clause to donate and drop money on them with no incentives. That type of donation I feel demeans receivers and givers.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Ireland with a worldwide Catholic religious organisation dedicated to the education of young people.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others who have the desire and determination to find creative ways to support themselves and their families, but might not have the capital or financial means to get started.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching music; directing choirs. I now teach private voice lessons to help supplement my pension and stay financially stable since my husband died last year.
